lenders.name: Dirk

lenders.occupational_info: I am an academic studying the field of development economics. I try to figure out more efficient ways to improve the economic situation in developing countries. My focus is on trade and the environment.

lenders.name: Beth and Joshua

lenders.occupational_info: Je traduis du français en anglais pour le Parlement du Canada. I am a French-English translator and I work for Canada's Parliament.

lenders.name: robocombot

lenders.occupational_info: design buildings, sometimes they get built!

lenders.name: Abiol
lenders.loan_because: I am a part of this world and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Assistant in Mergers and Acquisitions

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Two friends of mine generously asked that donations be made to Kiva in lieu of gifts for their wedding. I had heard of microloan organizations previously, but their gesture got me started at Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a physician (Neurologist) and scientist--I care for people with debilitating or fatal nerve and muscle disorders in the Clinic, and I search for causes and cures in the Laboratory.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I feel everyone in the world needs a chance.....
lenders.occupational_info: Crazy and stressfull

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: We are all ONE and I want to help those less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with my hands in the earth, or holding a tool, tending plants in people's yards.  I do everything organically and consider all of the Earth's creatures in my every action, including the Earth itself.

lenders.name: Kassi
lenders.loan_because: I love being part of people helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with electronics and software to make things work.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.occupation: MA Sustainable Development grad, USPS letter carri
lenders.loan_because: Reducing poverty and improving the quality of life for poor people greatly adds to my spiritual wealth and ultimately makes the world a better place for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: My day job is to deliver letters and packages to people at their homes.  This gives me the time and means to be able to help others and to pursue my passion for microfinance and economic development.

lenders.occupational_info: A lot of playing at the park. We like monkey bars and swings.

lenders.occupational_info: I write text and stories. For business and pleasure. (In dutch)

lenders.name: absolutearts

lenders.name: Dona

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: Want to help make a difference

because I thought it would be a great way to help 
people around the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who are having difficulty emotionally and feel sad, upset, or unhappy.

lenders.loan_because: I like to share.

lenders.name: Abbey
lenders.loan_because: I am only one person and Kiva has allowed me to be help others to my full potential.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing can change the world.

lenders.name: Heather

lenders.occupational_info: I run a business the provides services to children with disabilities.

lenders.name: Damtien

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the national government program in the U.S.A. that strives to make air, water and land safe from pollution.

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.loan_because: as a person who became (and still is) temporarily disabled. i learned how difficult it is to become a productive member of society again without help. it's practically impossible and it's not because we dont' want to...i live in a country that gives me the financial help i need to get my power back. i am now choosing to be the financial help my brothers and sisters need but don't receive from their governments.
lenders.occupational_info: people who work in the spiritual and self growth or consciousness industries come to me and ask me to type up and design their website or newsletters for them.

lenders.name: Jodie
lenders.loan_because: we should all be helping those who need a hand and i'm happy to do whatever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the airport for the Australian government.  I meet people from all over the world everyday.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: Providing others with new opportunities that are empowering and mutually beneficial is one of the best things a person can do.  Loaning through Kiva is one of the all to rare ways in which the provision of money yields these kinds of opportunities on a global scale.  I loan because I want more for us all.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional woodworker, instrument maker and antiques restorer.  I am currently involved with the restoration of Trinity Cathedral in Columbia, South Carolina, here in the United States.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others to help themselves through their small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of Thrifty Homes LLC, a rental real estate investment company.

lenders.name: Valeta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of giving. To give is one of the most selfless acts of kindness that we can share with the world. It takes minimal effort, yet the outcomes are always magnanimous.
lenders.occupational_info: My degree is in Urban Affairs & Planning. I am still in the process of trying to jump start a career in this field. This degree will enable me to work on projects that will benefit the greater good of various communities. It is extremely fulfilling.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a network operations center.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to provide support for others to become self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Debbie G Cook

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I can't change the world, but I can at least try to help one who tries and truly deserve a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to help. And because I am lucky enough to be able to and I want to spread that luck around a little.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about women giving it a go. I like to support businesses related to textiles, food,, housing, and health.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a mum who appreciates the basic things in life, and want the best for future generations.

lenders.name: alice
lenders.loan_because: I believe in personal initiative to lift yourself out of hard circumstances and I believe in supporting this initiative as a pay back (or pay it forward!).

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: While my resources are limited, Kiva gives me an opportunity to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva.org offers a wonderful way to help people find empowerment and stability in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children with special needs... hopefully, empowering them through education!

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I am able to and because it is sincerely humbling and rewarding to be a small part of something that is a lot larger than even my own personal ambitions.  Ultimately , I choose to loan simply because I want to help those that are asking for help.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I would say that I am professionally at the moment working on behalf of a automotive manufacturer in consumer protection matters.  Looking towards the future(if the Yankees front office doesn't call on my services of course), just like you, I want to earn a living doing something I love!

lenders.name: Bob Gray (BobSongs)
lenders.loan_because: I have had an abundance of blessings in my life.  And I believe in the words of Jim Henson... 'I would like to leave the world a little better, when I am gone, than when I got here !'
lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer geek... unless I am doing something else, and then I am just a geek.

lenders.name: Cezar
lenders.loan_because: I want a better world.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: ... i think people building their own business are great people.

lenders.name: William

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: this way of support lets people keep their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find out how to support preschool children with a migration background in a better way to learn the language of the country they live in.

lenders.name: inge
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country, where everyone has a chance for a good life. Therefore i like to help persons, which are not so lucky!

Working within the IT and telecommunications sector.

lenders.name: Mark

lenders.name: Sabine

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: to help small business

lenders.name: Eugene
lenders.loan_because: I am aware of world poverty, especially in rural Africa. I understand the needs of impoverished women and men that can't access traditional banks and I know the power of capital in the hands of bright entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the CEO and founder of ICAfrica. What I do is find and provide to impoverished people in Africa, essential resources that will help them improve their lives and lives of others within their communities.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: I think helping people to get back on their feet is a better way to help than giving them a loaf of bread. And why not help if I can?
lenders.occupational_info: I have coffee with people, talk with them, and then help.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: We are not blessed because we are somehow wonderful or otherwise deserving...we are blessed to BE a blessing!
lenders.occupational_info: I provide lifestyle management services to individuals who need help managing their busy lives.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying to be a medical doctor.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing goes to the people who need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I help government and companies keep their information assets secure.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: I see my life as privileged. There are time when I have to struggle, but it is never as bad as it could be, nor as bad for me as it is for someone else. I loan because I spend money on frivialous things for my pleasure, and in order to keep my energies good I need to give to those who are in need. I loan because it is empowering and nothing is better than feeling and knowing you CAN do whatever you need or want to do with your life. I loan because it feels good to give back to someone, or some cause, that is greater than myself.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have many jobs... 
My first is as a Leasing Consultant. I rent apartment homes to people in the Philadelphia, PA area. 
My second is a Personal Assistant and Lifestyle Manager. This is a great job! I get to be involved with people's personal and professional lives by creating organizational freedom, time management abilities, and healthy lifestyle options for them. 

The third, is a wholesale fine jewelry representative. I sell a line of Silve, Gold, Murano Glass, and Crystal Jewelry to Fine Jewlery and Gift Stores in PA, NJ, and OH.

And, once a week, a take a couple of hours to clean houses. It is a good supplemental income, I love to clean, and it feels great to provide these people, my clients, with a clean and clutter free home.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of microfinancing and it feels good to give.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with good intentions who are sincere and serious about obtaining their goals in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair cars and trucks for a Chrysler dealer.

lenders.name: Leon
lenders.loan_because:
We can help!!! 
Start-Up

lenders.occupational_info: I tell jokes for a living.

lenders.loan_because: I can, and I want to.

lenders.occupational_info: I now undertake charity work in the areas of childhood cancer and homeless youth.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people. I came from hard times, and people helped me, so now I try and give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit health care agency, and oversee several group homes for people with Mental Retardation and Mental Illness, and try and make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Christiansen Family

lenders.name: Shreekar Ranade
lenders.loan_because: Helping entrepreneurs at the lowest level of society is the best way to break the cycle of poverty. I lend responsibly because I believe the cycle of poverty can only end with hard work and a lucky break - no government handouts ever helped break a human's bond with poverty - only hard work will/did.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and manage systems and processes that enable businesses to operate efficiently. I am passionate about technology and the interaction of humans with technology.

lenders.name: Matt

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit that represents biotechnology and life sciences companies in California. Mary is an amazing first grade teacher.

lenders.occupational_info: I make and sell jewelry and accessories.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with a company that looks for oil and gas in the US so that we can help America meet its energy needs.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I live a good life and am presently in a position to help others as I have been helped in the past. Lending through Kiva seems to be the best way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: Time for a change - from construction to personal trainer! Loving every minute of my new career. I'm helping people make healther choices in their lives.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
I take money for granted, and I know these people won't. 


"Dedicate (donate, give all) your life to something larger than yourself and your pleasure -- to relieving suffering... happiness lies this way, and it beats pleasure hollow." -- Annie Dillard

lenders.name: Morten
lenders.loan_because: I can...

lenders.occupational_info: I try organizing the perfect environment for scientists so that they can do the best research possible.

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Pacifica Fog & Wine

lenders.name: Joep Vanlier
lenders.loan_because: I have the ability to do so

lenders.name: Michael MinKhin

lenders.name: vicky
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We are one world, and we are in this together. Without a person to reach out a hand (to give or receive) where would we be? I also want to set an example for my grandchildren.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children while their parents work at other businesses

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by investing in grassroots projects and independent businesses you give people the power and autonomy to help themselves, build a better future, and not rely on charity, which all too often undermines self belief and perpetuates poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I travel as much as I can and write about the places I visit and the people I meet for a range of websites, magazines and newspapers in the UK.

lenders.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a rural church that provides a food pantry and a women's shelter for our community. I also take members of my church on mission trips: we have been to Kenya to help with the Rafiki AIDS Orphanage in Kikuyu, Kenya and gave a scholarship for a student to complete her vocational training.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is an organization i feel good about supporting and I know that the money is really helping people earn their living.

lenders.name: Alex

lenders.loan_because: I am able.

lenders.occupational_info: i work in an inner-city Emergency Department which is also a Level-One Trauma Center.

lenders.name: Brigitte

lenders.name: JasonC
lenders.loan_because:
I was inspired by Muhammad Yunus' story and encouraged by his book "A World Without Poverty."

"If I could be useful to another human being, even for a day, that would be a great thing."  M. Yunus

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: I help others become successful online as an internet marketer at http://steamdrivenmedia.com

lenders.name: Thierry
lenders.loan_because:
I live in a situation and a place where I can do it.
Because I believe that helping those who have less resources is right.
Because I think it's the right thing to do.
Because I'd like someone to trust me if I was in their position.

Because I'm a "human being" in it's wide acceptance, and I embrace it.
lenders.occupational_info:
My day job is related to computer. I'm a DBA (database administrator).
On my free time, I enjoy playing with my daughter, spending quality time with my wife, riding my motorbike, and programming small and mostly futile programs.
It's so much fun...

lenders.name: Sahayak
lenders.loan_because: To be of service to those who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have over 10 years experience in raising funds through community and business activities for NFP's. We am currently travelling and performing our music for an extended period overseas.

lenders.name: janek

lenders.name: BayouBhoy (Steve)
lenders.loan_because: I was on the receiving end of a tremendous amount of charity following Hurricane Katrina in 2005. Most notably from my fellow supporters of Celtic FC throughout the world. I discovered Kiva through the Global Hoops Celtic Supporters Club.  As Celtic FC was formed in 1888 with the goal of alleviating poverty in Glasgow's East End, it makes sense for Celtic supporters to try an do what they can to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the controller for a small family business in Louisiana. I run payroll, do the taxes, and pay the bills among other things.

lenders.name: Carel & Bonnie

lenders.name: Market Street Traders
lenders.loan_because: We can. We want to spread the word about Kiva and the great work they are doing.  We started a lending group and are trying to set up several in our local schools to teach the kids about micro lending and fair trade merchandise.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a retail store and cafe that sells only fair trade merchandise.  We opened the cafe so we could sell fair trade coffee and serve fair trade wine.  We make our own fudge using fair trade chocolate.

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: it gives me immense satisfaction to see people fight against all odds to try to stand up on their feet. I feel that for these kind of people, we should always let our hearts and wallet remain open.

lenders.loan_because: I wish to fund individual projects directly
lenders.occupational_info: I work to educate Americans on the importance of conscious consumerism.  We can change the world in small ways by being conscious of the impacts of our purchasing power.
